meanings.sent1: She repoured the juice into her glass.
meanings.sent2: He repoured the coffee into the mug.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy waiter repoured the water all over the table.
meanings.sent4: The artist repoured his emotions onto the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The chef repoured the sauce, creating a masterpiece dish.

meanings.definition: Pour (a liquid) back into a container.
meanings.sent1: Mom repoured the milk into the bottle.
meanings.sent2: Dad repoured the oil into the canister.
meanings.sent3: The cat repoured the spilled water into the bowl.
meanings.sent4: The gardener repoured the soil into the pot, nurturing the plant.
meanings.sent5: The scientist repoured the solution, conducting the experiment carefully.
